AC Nutritionis te ofrece un enfoque cent: AC Nutritionis offers you an approach focused on mind-body connection and promotes a healthy and balanced relationship with food through nutritional education.
Consigamos juntos dejar de lado a la cul: Let's work together to set aside diet culture, allowing you to cultivate aspects such as self-compassion, enjoyment of food, and reconnecting with your hunger and fullness cues.
Si quieres conocer más sobre cómo establ: If you want to learn more about how to establish and maintain a healthy relationship with food, from theory to practical application, live and personalized with me, then this option is for you.
¡Hola! Soy Alejandro, Dietista-Nutricion: Hello! I'm Alejandro, a Dietitian-Nutritionist specializing in Eating Disorders and Obesity.
Mi objetivo es ayudarte con un enfoque ú: My goal is to assist you with a unique approach to nutrition and intuitive eating. Recognizing the complexity of relationships with food and the body.
Además de contar con experiencia en el á: In addition to my experience in the field of eating disorders and obesity, I am also well-versed in digestive pathologies, capable of providing you with a comprehensive approach to improving your health and well-being through mindful eating and self-care.
Alimentación en pacientes con patologías: Nutrition for patients with digestive disorders (such as IBS, SIBO, etc.)
Alimentación para pacientes con obesidad: Nutrition for obese patients, DM2, etc.
Te ayudaré a mejorar tu alimentación y s: I will help you improve your diet and health by addressing various concepts such as self-compassion, motivation, and empathy

Entrega y explicación de tu plan: Providing and explaining your dietary plan

¿Aún tienes dudas sobre empezar tu plan?: Do you still have doubts about starting your plan? Get to know me by selecting this package, and we will schedule a 20-30 minute session for you to tell me about your situation in a general way and learn about my working method without any commitment.

Contrata una consulta individual para em: Hire an individual consultation to start with your personalized treatment. I will provide you with practical and theoretical tools that will help you achieve your goals and reconnect with your biological signals.
